column2: Latest;According to the Ministry of Water Resources and Meteorology
column3: 60 mm of rainfall fell in  Oddar Meanchey province’s Samraong district. Water in Trapeang Veng continued to rise on the 13th of September 2018. ------To avoid potential risks
column4: the Provincial Department of Water Resources and Meteorology decided to open 4 sluice-gates and release some water into the nearby area.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/370154
